content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5) waiting for source items
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5) with no fuel

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (x=60.0, y=-60.0) with no ingredients

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5) working
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0) with no fuel
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5) not connected
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5) empty
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5) with full output
- Electricity group (position x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668) not plugged into the electric network

### Transport belt at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of two transport belts at positions (x=63.5, y=-53.5) and (x=64.5, y=-53.5) both working

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities with no fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before attempting to use them
### Errors when using entities with no ingredients
- Ensure that entities have the necessary ingredients before attempting to use them
### Errors when using steam engines not connected to a power source
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power source before attempting to use them
### Errors when using pipe groups with no output
- Ensure that pipe groups have an output before attempting to use them
### Errors when using electricity groups not plugged into the electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into the electric network before attempting to use them
### Errors when using belt groups with no input
- Ensure that belt groups have an input before attempting to use them

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned.
